description: This file initializes a Cassandra keyspace, sets up a PDF knowledge base with vector database integration, creates an agent with a Mistral chat model, and runs an asynchronous query to retrieve information about the health benefits of a specific dish.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent that interacts with a knowledge base and a language model.

classes.name: MistralEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using the Mistral model for vector similarity search.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base that loads and processes PDF documents from URLs.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: Chat model based on the Mistral language model.

classes.name: Cassandra
classes.description: Wrapper for Cassandra vector database operations.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: aprinResponse
methods.description: Generates a response from the agent based on a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
